code: import React from'react';import'./Blog.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Blog=()=>{const posts=[{title:"Concord Open Beta gameplay tips: Crew Roles, Skillful Loops, recommended Freegunners and more",author:"Gillen McAllister",date:"July 18, 2024",image:"image.webp",description:"Open Beta available from July 18 - 21."},{title:"Mortal Kombat 1: Takeda’s disarming Brutality revealed",author:"Dominic Cianciolo",date:"July 18, 2024",image:"mortal.png",description:"Takeda’s brutal move is sure to shake up the competition."},{title:"Splitgate 2 portals over to PS5 and PS4 in 2025",author:"Ian Proulx",date:"July 18, 2024",image:"valo.png",description:"Get ready for the next level of portal combat."},{title:"PlayStation Plus Monthly Games for July: Borderlands 3, NHL 24, Among Us",author:"Adam Michel",date:"June 26, 2024",image:"play.webp",description:"A great selection of games for PlayStation Plus members."}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"blog",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("video",{autoPlay:true,muted:true,loop:true,className:"background-video",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("source",{src:"backgroundh.mp4",type:"video/mp4"}),"Your browser does not support the video tag."]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Our Blog"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"blog-list",children:posts.map((post,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"blog-post",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:post.image,alt:post.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"post-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:post.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"author",children:["By ",post.author," on ",post.date]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:post.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#",className:"cta",children:"Read More"})]})]},index))})]})]});};export default Blog;
